mapper.insert: insert into rpt_site_summary (site_id, site_code, site_name, `date`, new_vip_num,recharge_number,recharge) values (#{siteId}, #{siteCode}, #{siteName}, #{date}, 1,1,#{recharge}) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE new_vip_num = new_vip_num + 1, recharge_number = recharge_number + 1, recharge = recharge + #{recharge}
insert into rpt_site_summary (site_id, site_code, site_name,`date`,new_user_num) values (#{siteId}, #{siteCode}, #{siteName}, #{date}, 1) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE new_user_num = new_user_num + 1
